dialogue.text: Well, that was convenient, we managed to out-sing the security system!
Yeah, I wonder who'd build a karaoke mode into a defense robot anyway....
Who the funk are you and what do you THINK you're doing here?!
Well, I-
AND WHAT DID YOU DO TO AARON?!
Aaron? Don't you think thats kind of a sweet name for such a scary robot?
Th-that's besides the point! I don't know who you think you are, but...
You have a lot of nerve to step up in here and start destroying my things.
Well actually, me and my boyfriend were just here to talk to you about something.
And well, what would that be?
Well ma'am, we were just here to have you take down a game that my girlfriend's parents weren't fond of.
Oh! That's who you two are! I knew I recognized that blue hair somewhere.
Well, you seem nice, but that doesn't make up for the damage you did to Aaron right here,
...nor the breaking and entering.
But I think I know something that would excuse y'all.
And that would be....?
You, silly!
WHAT?
HUH?
What? I don't see any issue, your boyfriend's just a runt anyway! The only thing he can do is sing!
Actually...that gives me an idea...
Aight, let's rap it out. If you win, you keep the girl and resist the charges.
And if I win, I'm taking your girl and getting you arrested!
Aight, bet.
Bring it on!
